attributes.action: Enact a new law titled Misrepresentation of Faiths Act. Debate and enshrine.
attributes.additional_details: As a result of the gross misrepresentation of Islam by groups such as IS along with many groups misrepresenting other faith traditions, the time has come to introduce a Misrepresentation of Faiths Act in UK law so that British citizens are able to differentiate between the reality and core teachings of the respective faiths and what are a gross misrepresentations and distortion of those faith traditions. This topic be debated in Parliament with a view to facilitating the laws implementation.
attributes.background: With many of the World’s great religions being hijacked and misrepresented by violent extremists through indiscriminate killing of innocence and acts of terror, the UK should enact a new law titled Misrepresentation of Faiths Act to differentiate between the two.
